column2: Aureldi''' means "Away-elf" and is a name for the [[Amanyar]] [[Elves]].<ref>{{HM|WJ}}
the name is from the [[Sindar]] point of view
column3: since it refers to the Elves who departed [[Beleriand]] for [[Aman]].

column1: The [[Vanyarin]] form is ''Oazel'' and ''Auzel'' and incorporates ''[[oar]]'' "away" and ''[[eldar|el(d)]]'' "Elv". It derives from *''awazeld-''
